sentences.sContent: First it is revocable at any time, and it is his son and his chief financial officer who are running it.
sentences.sContent_eng: First it is revocable at any time, and it is his son and his chief financial officer who are running it.
sentences.sCn: 首先它是随时可撤销的，而且运营者是他的儿子和他的首席财务官。

remMethod.val: re(反) + voc(喊) + able → 反过来喊的 → 可撤销的

trans.tranCn: 可撤销的； 可废止的
trans.tranOther: capable of being revoked; able to be cancelled
